TEXT.TITLE: BRAZILIAN COFFEE RAINFALL
TEXT.BODY: THE FOLLOWING RAINFALL WAS RECORDED IN THE AREAS OVER THE PAST 24 HOURS PARANA STATE: UMUARAMA NIL, PARANAVAI NIL, LONDRINA NIL, MARINGA NIL. SAO PAULO STATE PRESIDENTE PRUDENTE NIL, VOTUPORANGA NIL, FRANCA NIL, CATANDUVA NIL, SAO CARLOS NIL, SAO SIMAO NIL. MINAS GERAIS STATE: GUAXUPE 33.0 MILLIMETRES, TRES PONTAS 5.0 MM. REUTER
